item.description:
Hike up from The Old Toll Rd. via Halfway House trail to Halfway house clearing-take Mt. Rosa Trail to top of Mt. Rosa cross over top Mt. Rosa towards Great Meadow trail then follow the abandoned but maintained Smith-Marlborough ridge trail join Marlborough Tr. follow to Summit.
Return White dot to Paradise/Purgatory trail cross over to White Arrow Tr. follow down to Halfway house clearing return to parking area via Halfway house tr.

Paradise/Purgatory is another abandoned trail which Graffitti cave is located off of. One of Monadnocks hidden secrets.
This hike is around 5 miles should take 3-3.5 hours to hike.

$5 parking fee

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Mt. Monadnock..Smith Marlborough Ridge Trail
